en.serviceName: Update an appeal to the First-tier Tribunal
en.title: Update an existing First-tier Tribunal case
en.paragraph1: Use this service to update a case that has already been submitted to the First-tier Tribunal.
en.paragraph2: You may want to send the Tribunal some extra paperwork that was not available at the time you initially submitted your tribunal form. Or you may want to give the Tribunal some extra details about aspects of your case.
en.paragraph3: To update an existing case, you will need the case reference number.

cy.serviceName: Update an appeal to the First-tier Tribunal - welsh
cy.title: Update an existing First-tier Tribunal case - welsh
cy.paragraph1: Use this service to update a case that has already been submitted to the First-tier Tribunal. - welsh
cy.paragraph2: You may want to send the Tribunal some extra paperwork that was not available at the time you initially submitted your tribunal form. Or you may want to give the Tribunal some extra details about aspects of your case. - welsh
cy.paragraph3: To update an existing case, you will need the case reference number. - welsh
